thread.title: Gaza farmer killed by Israeli tank shell as tensions rise

title: Gaza farmer killed by Israeli tank shell as tensions rise
text:
Gaza farmer killed by Israeli tank shell as tensions rise 3:12am EDT - 01:24 
A Gaza farmer was killed and a second man was wounded by an Israeli tank shell on Friday, a Gaza health ministry spokesman said, on a day of heightened tensions ahead of planned protests by Palestinians along the border with Israel. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Gaza farmer was killed and a second man was wounded by an Israeli tank shell on Friday, a Gaza health ministry spokesman said, on a day of heightened tensions ahead of planned protests by Palestinians along the border with Israel.
